name: The Essence
description: This is the first in a series of seven GLB works responding to the sentence ‘The essence of art is to create an emotional response for the viewer, and in the maker’. The works demonstrate my natural inclination towards a graphic style. The puzzle-like structures, invoke feelings of balance and symmetry, two visual elements human beings are drawn to. The sentence is broken up into seven parts and each part gives name to one of the works. 2D versions are on Eth blockchain an 3D NFT’S are on Tez
